#include<iostream>
#include<queue>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<cstdio>
inline int inp()
    {
    int noRead=0;
    char p=getchar_unlocked();
    for(;p<33;){p=getchar_unlocked();};
    while(p>32)
    {
    noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
    p=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return noRead;
    };
using namespace std;
struct node
{
	int start;
	int end;
} p;
bool operator<(const node &a, const node &b)
{
    return a.end > b.end;
}
priority_queue<node> PQ;
int t,n,curr,count;
int main()
{
	t=inp();
	while(t--)
	{
		n=inp();curr=0;count=0;
		while(n--)
		{
			p.start=inp();p.end=inp();
			PQ.push(p);
		}
		while(!PQ.empty())
		{
			p=PQ.top();PQ.pop();
			if(p.start>=curr)
			{count++;curr=p.end;}
		}
		printf("%d\n",count);
	}
	return 0;
}
